PHRASE.LANG: This trophy is a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "Pick of the Litter Award" for winning 5 races in a row betting 3 or more coins on the winner. [#Legal]

Ce trophée est une récompense de "A Day At The Races" article course de chevaux. C'est le "Pick of the Litter Award" pour avoir remporté 5 courses d'affilée paris 3 ou plusieurs pièces de monnaie sur le vainqueur. [#Legal]
This trophy is a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "Pick of the Litter Award" for winning 5 races in a row betting 3 or more coins on the winner. [#Legal]
